page.title: 03Evacuation Part 1
page.content:
It started off as a{meeting}in the { church.Just before Christmas.People were told that they had to be evacuated and that the area had to be cleared by{20th December 1943.} Farmers had to take their livestock to the knackers yard and sell their machinery. Some people travelled as far as{Cornwall}or{Yorkshire,}some travelled as close as{Ashprington}(a village a few miles away). Most of the old people who were evacuated never returned to Blackawton.
The American troops practised for{D} {Day}on{Slapton}sands.On one practice something went wrong,hundreds of soldiers died and a tank sank.People were not allowed back to the area until the{autumn of 1944.}
